description.text: This submodule represents the AdapterService for the Network Devices

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: A representation of the Adapter for NetDevs itself.
Represents the relationship between ServiceAccessPoint by the ProvidesEnpoint through the NetDev Management Interface
Represents the relationship to ietf-ServiceAccessPoint by the ServiceSAPDependency through the NetDev Management Interface
